official_title: A bill to amend the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to exclude from the financial resources of households certain funds set aside for burial expenses of elderly and disabled members and their spouses.

summary.text: Amends the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to exclude from a household's financial resources certain funds set aside for burial expenses of elderly and disabled members and their spouses.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to exclude from the financial resources of households certain funds set aside for burial expenses of elderly and disabled members and their spouses.
